item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-01
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: Flickr And Twitter are Now Officially Sucking Face (via @raduboncea) #
  • RT @ckirsten: Happy 3rd birthday Sonoma. This is a photo the day we got her :) #
  • Happy Birthday Sonoma! 3 years young today! #
  • Selling my old iPod nano on eBay if anyone is interested - #
  • RT @eatboston: Smoke'em if you got'em? Roadhouse is shutting down their smoker after neighbors complain. #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
